meanings.definition: A white, crystalline compound used as a moth repellent.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled paradichlorobenzenes in my closet to keep moths away.
meanings.sent2: The paradichlorobenzenes effectively repelled the moths from my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The moths were so scared of the paradichlorobenzenes, they flew away in a hurry!
meanings.sent4: The paradichlorobenzenes created an invisible shield against the moths.
meanings.sent5: The smell of paradichlorobenzenes was like a force field protecting my clothes.

meanings.definition: Chemical compounds with the formula C6H4Cl2.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the properties of paradichlorobenzenes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The production of paradichlorobenzenes requires precise chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The classroom smelled like paradichlorobenzenes after the chemistry experiment.
meanings.sent4: The formula C6H4Cl2 represents the structure of paradichlorobenzenes.
meanings.sent5: The purity of paradichlorobenzenes is crucial for certain industrial processes.
